sentence.Network_en: It was decided to discontinue the treatment after three months.
sentence.Network_cn: 三个月后决定终止治疗。

sentence.Network_en: He asked them to discontinue flights over the island.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要求他们停止在该岛上空飞行.

sentence.Network_en: They threatened to discontinue buying it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们威胁说要终止这桩买卖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'interrupt, disrupt'): via Old French from medieval Latin discontinuare, from Latin dis- 'not' + continuare (see continue)

entry.def: If you discontinue something that you have been doing regularly, you stop doing it.

example.ex: Do not discontinue the treatment without consulting your doctor.
example.tran: 未经医嘱不得中断治疗。

entry.def: If a product is discontinued, the manufacturer stops making it.

example.ex: The Leica M2 was discontinued in 1967...
example.tran: 徕卡 M2 型相机于 1967 年停产。

example.ex: They have a huge selection of discontinued cookers.
example.tran: 他们有大量绝版的精选炉灶。

means.word_mean: 1. put an end to a state or an activity;
2. come or be at an end;

sentences.sentence: "the support from our sponsoring agency will discontinue after March 31"

auth_sentence.content: It meant he was able to discontinue the prophylaxis drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content: It meant he was able to discontinue the prophylaxis drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It meant he was able to discontinue the prophylaxis drugs.

auth_sentence.content: Have them meet periodically to decide which products to discontinue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Have them meet periodically to decide which products to discontinue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have them meet periodically to decide which products to discontinue.

auth_sentence.content: Withhold, dose reduce, or discontinue BOSULIF as necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Withhold, dose reduce, or discontinue BOSULIF as necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Withhold, dose reduce, or discontinue BOSULIF as necessary.

sentences.en: They threatened to discontinue buying it.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁说要终止这桩买卖。

sentences.en: The airline says this route is no longer economic,so they’re going to discontinue it.
sentences.cn: 航空公司说这条航线不再赚钱,因此他们准备关闭。

sentences.en: The bus service was discontinued because nobody used it.
sentences.cn: 那条公交线因没有乘客而停止营运。
